au.gov.sbr.core.client.beans
Class KeyStoreBean

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.application.AbstractBean
      au.gov.sbr.core.client.beans.BeanBase
          au.gov.sbr.core.client.beans.KeyStoreBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class KeyStoreBean
extends BeanBase

This bean represents the Authentication KeyStore. It contains all the Properties that are exposed to the GUI for binding to the key store group on the GUI.

See Also:
Serialized Form

KeyStoreBean()
          Constructs a newly allocated KeyStoreBean object that represents an in-memory collection of keys and credentials.
